hobbies.name: Music
hobbies.description: I'm not just listening music at all time, but I'm playing several instruments. (Some of them better, some of them not that much.)

hobbies.name: Climbing
hobbies.description: I'm reacently going to climbing gym and when I can, I like to climb outdoor.

hobbies.name: Cycling
hobbies.description: When I have to go somewhere, if I can I use my bicycle all the times.

hobbies.name: Yuppi
hobbies.description: I'm a volunteer at Yuppi camp.

hobbies.name: Slackline
hobbies.description: I'm not confident enough in the slackline yet, but work in progress and I'd like to try out highline too. (That's the main motivation.. : )

hobbies.name: Fire Juggling
hobbies.description: I do like juggling with several instruments and I like to spice the performance with fire if I'm confident enough with the instrument (like with poi).

hobbies.name: Crafting & woodworking
hobbies.description: I want to make my own furniture (and other stuffs) by my own hand.

hobbies.name: Reading
hobbies.description: Unfortunately I didn't read a lot. But after I've read the "Az Irodalom Visszav√°g", it brought my mood to read more.
